sentences.en: All sediment deposition is not injurious.
sentences.cn: 所有的泥沙淤积并不都是有害的.

sentences.en: Channels generally contain coarser sediment than do the adjacent flood plains.
sentences.cn: 河床沉积物一般比邻近的泛滥平原沉积物粗些.

sentences.en: Deposition is the laying down of sediment that has been transported.
sentences.cn: 沉积是已搬运的物质再沉积下来.

sentences.en: For highly cohesive sediment, the critical tractive force becomes less significant.
sentences.cn: 对于高粘性泥沙, 临界推移力就成为不重要的.

sentences.en: Natural sediment particles are not spherical.
sentences.cn: 天然泥沙颗粒不是球状的.

sentences.en: Pelagic sediment contains tiny grain of material.
sentences.cn: 远洋沉积物包含了微细物质颗粒.

sentences.en: Rivers and torrents carried great loads of sediment out to sea.
sentences.cn: 河流挟着大量沉积物奔流入海.

sentences.en: Sediment begins to choke the channel's opening.
sentences.cn: 沉积物开始淤塞河道口.

sentences.en: The arrow indicates direction of sediment transportation.
sentences.cn: 箭头表示沉积物的搬运方向.

sentences.en: The nominal diameter has little significance in sediment transportation.
sentences.cn: 等容粒径在沉沙输移中意义不大.

sentences.en: The sediment of coffee will settle.
The sediment settled and the water was clear.
They sediment toward the bottom of the centrifuge tube at a velocity.
sentences.cn: 它们以某一速度向管底方向沉降.

sentences.en: This is changeable and rapid rate of sediment production.
sentences.cn: 这是种多变而快速的沉积作用.

sentences.en: What does the terrigenous sediment consist of?
sentences.cn: 陆源沉积物是由什么组成的?

words.tran_cn: [矿业][物化] 沉降，[化学] 沉淀

phrases.tran_cn: 输沙量；输沙率；土砂流量；沉积物流量；沉淀物排放
沉积物运移；泥沙流移；土砂流送

trans.tran_en: solid substances that settle at the bottom of a liquid
